snippet.title: Layers of Fears - Official Trailer | gamescom 2022
snippet.description:
The latest trailer for Layers of Fears puts a spotlight on one of the new storylines coming to the game. We get a peek at 'The Final Note,' a new chapter that allows you to take control of the Painter’s Wife, a devastated musician whose side of the story we are yet to hear in its entirety, providing a new perspective behind the family’s tragedy.

Layers of Fear, the revised take on the complete horror chronicle Layers of Fear, is coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and Windows PC in 2023.
